Class DbInfo

extends java.lang.Object

getTimestampedDb

public final com.sleepycat.je.SecondaryDatabase getTimestampedDb()
Get the timestamped db, possibly null.

hasTimestampedDb

public final boolean hasTimestampedDb()
Report whether this instance has a timestamped database.

hasStringKeys

public final boolean hasStringKeys()
Report whether the db has string keys. The alternative is long keys.

If not set on the instance, the value will be computed based on the absence of "_id" at the end of the dbName.

setHasLongKeys

public final void setHasLongKeys()
Record on this instance (transiently) that the keys should be assumed to be longs.

setHasLongKeys

public final void setHasLongKeys(boolean hasLongKeys)
Record on this instance (transiently) whether the keys should be assumed to be longs.

getKeyEntry

public final com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseEntry getKeyEntry(java.lang.String string)
Wrapper to translate a (string) key into a DatabaseEntry.

getKeyEntry

public final com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseEntry getKeyEntry(long key)
Wrapper to translate a (long) key into a DatabaseEntry.

getValueEntry

public final com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseEntry getValueEntry(DbValue dbValue)
Wrapper to translate a value into a DatabaseEntry.

Note that the stored value will be a timestamped value if this instance is configured with a timestamped db; otherwise, it will be the string itself.

getValueEntry

public final com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseEntry getValueEntry(DbValue newValue,
                                                          java.lang.Long oldTimestamp)
Wrapper to translate a value into a DatabaseEntry that preserves the oldValue's timestamp if applicable.

Note that the stored value will be a timestamped value if this instance is configured with a timestamped db; otherwise, it will be the string itself.

getKeyString

public final java.lang.String getKeyString(com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseEntry keyEntry)
Wrapper to extract the key string from the database entry.

Note that this assumes that string keys are consistently being used with this instance.

getDbValue

public final DbValue getDbValue(com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseEntry valueEntry)
Wrapper to extract the db value from the database entry.

The returned value will be a TimestampedValue if this instance is configured to maintain the secondary timestamped db; otherwise, it will be a DbValue with a timestamp of 0 (undefined).

getKeyLong

public final long getKeyLong(com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseEntry keyEntry)
Wrapper to extract the key (as a long) from the database entry.

Note that this assumes that long keys are consistently being used with this instance.

performTransaction

public boolean performTransaction(TransactionFunction txFn)
Perform the function under a transaction in this instance's environment.

getErrorCount

public final int getErrorCount()
Get the number of errors that have occurred.
